chapters.title: Chapter 1: Seeds of Shadow
chapters.info: Jaret Byar, p. 40 (25)—Second-in-command under Dain Bornhald over the army of Whitecloaks in the Two Rivers. Byar held fierce loyalty to Dain's father, Geofram, and transferred that loyalty to Dain when he died. See also Bornhald, Dain; Bornhald, Geofram.
